Package sample.controllers

Class GameController

  • java.lang.Object
    • sample.controllers.GameController
  • public class GameController
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles all bird actions, detection etc. Contains variables responsible for game and bird movement. Bird gravity equation, smooth jumping: dY += gravity + flapping y += dY Additionally creates background tasks for these operations.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      private void changeBird()
      Timeline handles bird's image change.
      private void collisionCheck()
      Collisiong timeline - checks if player touched any of pipes, if he did timeline stops rest of timelines which is basically stopping whole game and creates net Thread to insert user's score to db.
      private void initialize()
      Initialization of bird position, pipes' and bird's images.
      private void initiliaze_pipes()  
      private void keyPressed​(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent event)  
      private void pointsCheck()
      Timeline to increment user's points - whenever pipe is reseted point is added.
      private void restart()
      Responsible for starting/restarting game Creates all the timelines responsible for: Collision Detection Bird movement Pipes movement Points incrementing Bird image change
      private void shuffle_pipes​(java.util.ArrayList<javafx.scene.image.ImageView> pipes)  
      private void startGame()
      Creates rewind timeline - moves pipes and loops them over, array of 3 pipes which are reseted over whenever one reaches x=-50 Additionally creates jumping timeline which handles gravitaion and bird's acceleration.

      • initialize

        private void initialize()
        Initialization of bird position, pipes' and bird's images.

      • startGame

        private void startGame()
        Creates rewind timeline - moves pipes and loops them over, array of 3 pipes which are reseted over whenever one reaches x=-50 Additionally creates jumping timeline which handles gravitaion and bird's acceleration.

      • collisionCheck

        private void collisionCheck()
        Collisiong timeline - checks if player touched any of pipes, if he did timeline stops rest of timelines which is basically stopping whole game and creates net Thread to insert user's score to db.

      • pointsCheck

        private void pointsCheck()
        Timeline to increment user's points - whenever pipe is reseted point is added.
